alert.note: Alert for Baylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued July 26 at 8:04AM CDT until July 26 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 9 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR WESTERN AND NORTHERN OKLAHOMA AND WESTERN NORTH TEXAS... The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a Red Flag Warning for breezy winds and low relative humidities, which is in effect from noon today to 9 PM CDT this evening. * TIMING...Tuesday afternoon through early Tuesday evening. * WINDS...South 10 to 15 mph with gusts up to 25 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 23 percent. * TEMPERATURES...105 to 109.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures will contribute to extreme fire behavior.
